entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 09:32 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
